content:
That sounds like a great start to birding! I'd be happy to help you identify the birds you've seen in your backyard and on your hike.

To get started, can you tell me more about the birds you've seen at your feeder? What did they look like? What size were they? What colors did they have? Did they have any distinctive markings or features? Any details you can provide will help me narrow down the possibilities.

As for your hike, that's a great way to spot birds in a more natural habitat. Did you notice any birds while you were on the trails? Were there any birds that caught your attention, even if you're not sure what they were?

Also, do you have any idea what region you're in? Different regions have different bird species, so knowing your general location will help me provide more accurate identifications.

Let's get started, and I'll do my best to help you identify the birds you've seen!
